snippet: The World Food Program has been forced to cut back by a third its food voucher program for Syrian refugees living in neighboring countries.
abstract: World Food Program cuts back its food voucher program for Syrian refugees living in neighboring countries by one third; reduction affects Syrians fleeing country’s civil war, including 200,000 living in Jordan who will stop receiving any food aid.
lead_paragraph: The World Food Program has been forced to cut back by a third its food voucher program for Syrian refugees living in neighboring countries.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Syria: Food Support Is Reduced
